newsitem.title: PHILIPPINES: Piltel says sells shares to Philcom.
newsitem.headline: Piltel says sells shares to Philcom.

text.p: Cellular phone operator Pilipino Telephone Corp (Piltel) said on Wednesday its board has approved the sale of up to 258.25 million unissued common shares to phone gateway operator Philippine Global Communications Inc.
Secretary Michael Tantoco said in a statement the shares would be sold to Philicom at a minium price of 20 pesos each.
Piltel gained 75 centavos to 15 pesos in late Manila trade on Wednesday.
